translations: n.（计算机的）信息收发，电子邮件的发送和处理
v.发送；报信（message 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: Messaging allows real-time communication by keyboard with up to five people at any one time.
sentences.translation: 信息的发送能使最多五个人同时通过键盘进行实时交流。

sentences.sentence: I think text messaging actually sort of has to do with your age.
sentences.translation: 我觉得发短信实际上和你的年龄也有一定的关系。

sentences.sentence: Yeah, I think text-messaging actually sort of has to do with your age.
sentences.translation: 是的，我觉得发短信实际上和你的年龄有关。
